description: Understand the definition, history, and evolution of Java programming language
Examine the core features, syntax, and semantics of Java, including object-oriented programming (OOP) principles
Identify popular Java applications, frameworks, and libraries, such as Spring, Hibernate, and Android Studio
Explore the Java ecosystem, including the Java Virtual Machine (JVM), Java Runtime Environment (JRE), and Java Development Kit (JDK)
Investigate the current trends, developments, and challenges in the Java community, including version updates and performance enhancements
